```{r include=debug}

```

```{r}
b2 <- ggplot(data=subset(subset(food_world_cup, (thailand!="N/A")),location!="NA"), aes(x=location, fill=thailand)) +
        geom_bar(position = "fill") +
        labs(x="Location", y="Percentage of score", title="Thai Cuisine score by location") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

b2
```

```{r}
b2 <- ggplot(data=subset(subset(food_world_cup, thailand!="N/A"),location=="New England"), aes(x=age, fill=thailand)) +
        geom_bar(position = "fill") +
        labs(x="Age Range", y="Percentage", title="Thai Cusine score by age") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

b2
```

```{r}
b2 <- ggplot(data=subset(subset(food_world_cup, thailand!="N/A"),location=="New England"), aes(x=gender, fill=thailand)) +
        geom_bar(position = "fill") +
        labs(x="Gender", y="Percentage", title="Thai Cuisine score by gender") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

b2
```
